name: Snow ball war version 0.3
description:
Game is easy to handle, most of the commands are by mouse click.

The game is a Demo, Art is what i found free assets on stores. Soon ill start making art, but first i want to finish the programming.

Version 0.3 of this Demo have sounds now. There are more Sounds to add, but for now looks great.

Hoppe you like it, if some thing you think missing or not working properly , add a comment. Will help a lot. Thank you all for playing.
